Buffets are offered at various places including hotels, restaurants, and many social events. Buffet restaurants normally offer all-you-can-eat food for a set price, but some measure prices by weight or by number of dishes. Buffets usually have some hot dishes, so the term cold buffet (see smörgåsbord) has been developed to describe formats lacking hot food.
The term buffet originally referred to the French sideboard furniture where the food was served.
